ThingDef.label: brush turkey egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized brush turkey egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: brush turkey egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized brush turkey egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: copperhead egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized copperhead egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby copperhead. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: cactus mantis egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized cactus mantis egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby cactus mantis. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
